verses.text: The Lordhear thee in the day of trouble; The name of the God of Jacob defend thee;
Send thee help from the sanctuary, And strengthen thee out of Zion;
Remember all thy offerings, And accept thy burnt sacrifice. Selah.
Grant thee according to thine own heart, And fulfil all thy counsel.
We will rejoice in thy salvation, And in the name of our God we will set up ourbanners: The Lordfulfil all thy petitions.
Now know I that the Lordsaveth his anointed; He will hear him from his holy heaven With the saving strength of his right hand.
Some trustin chariots, and some in horses: But we will remember the name of the Lordour God.
They are brought down and fallen: But we are risen, and stand upright.
Save, Lord: Let the king hear us when we call.
